org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.utils

Class FixityInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FilterInputStream
        • org.apache.commons.io.input.ProxyInputStream
          • org.apache.commons.io.input.CountingInputStream
            • org.fcrepo.kernel.impl.utils.FixityInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class FixityInputStream
extends org.apache.commons.io.input.CountingInputStream
    An InputStream wrapper that calculates the size and digest while reading from the stream.
    Since:
    Mar 12, 2013
    Author:
    Chris Beer
